scripts.build:lib: ng build --configuration production shared-library && cd dist/shared-library && npm link
scripts.watch:lib: npm run build:lib && ng build shared-library --configuration production --watch
scripts.build:app1: npm link shared-library && ng build --configuration production app1
scripts.build:app2: npm link shared-library && ng build --configuration production app2
scripts.serve:app1: npm link shared-library && ng serve --configuration production app1 --port 4200 -o
scripts.serve:app2: npm link shared-library && ng serve --configuration production app2 --port 4201 -o
